ygData.subject: Rogues vs Tripreds ... a conclusion?
ygData.msgSnippet: Without warning, Devilcat breaks away from Kaiser.  Rogues, to me! he calls. Reikan disentangles himself from Dreadplague, and he, Fury, Noir, and Jayde join

Subject: Rogues vs Tripreds ... a conclusion?

Without warning, Devilcat breaks away from Kaiser.  "Rogues, to me!" 
he calls.

Reikan disentangles himself from Dreadplague, and he, Fury, Noir, and 
Jayde join their commander in what would seem to be a full, if 
abrupt, retreat.

"What's going on, Devilcat?" Noir asks, speaking quietly so the enemy 
won't hear.  "Why are we abandoning the battle?"

"We were getting nowhere," Devilcat explains.  "There's no use in 
prolonging things.  There will be another time.  Trust me."
